mapper.update:
update lightning_protection_tbl
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_test_time = #{lastTestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
test_results = #{testResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
detection_unit = #{detectionUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
test_report_number = #{testReportNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lightning_protection_tbl set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project = #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_test_time = #{lastTestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, test_results = #{testResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detection_unit = #{detectionUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_report_number = #{testReportNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select T1.id, T1.user_id userId, T1.project, T1.content, T1.last_test_time lastTestTime, T1.expiration_time expirationTime, T1.test_results testResults, T1.detection_unit detectionUnit, T1.test_report_number test_report_number, T1.remark, T2.name companyName from lightning_protection_tbl T1 left join company_view T2 on T1.user_id = T2.user_id
T2.is_del = 0
and T1.user_id = #{userId}
and T1.project LIKE CONCAT('%', #{project},'%')
and T2.village_id = #{villageId} and T2.town_id = #{townId} and T2.district_id = #{districtId}
and T1.user_id IN ( SELECT uid FROM trade_company_tbl WHERE tid = #{tradeId} )
and T2.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{companyName},'%')
order by id desc

select T1.id, T1.user_id userId, T1.project, T1.content, T1.last_test_time lastTestTime, T1.expiration_time expirationTime, T1.test_results testResults, T1.detection_unit detectionUnit, T1.test_report_number test_report_number, T1.remark from lightning_protection_tbl T1
T1.user_id = #{tradeId}
and T1.project LIKE CONCAT('%', #{project},'%')
order by T1.id desc
